user_instruction: 'Prepare a detailed response to the team leaders'"'"' request for a performance and budget report. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Performance Metrics & Budget Overview

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Mark and I are putting together a detailed performance and budget report for the Software Development and Digital Marketing teams. Could you please help us with the following?

1. Performance metrics (KPIs, recent evaluation summaries, and any notable achievements) for both teams covering Q1–Q2 FY-2024.
2. Budget utilization to date (allocated vs. spent) and any variances or projections we should be aware of for the same period.
3. Any relevant notes or flagged items that may affect upcoming resource planning.

You can reference the HR dashboard and the shared Notion workspace, or let us know if there’s anything specific we should pull from our email archives. If possible, please send the information—or point us to the exact location—by Friday, 5 p.m. so we can finalize the report early next week.

We appreciate your help and will, of course, keep all data strictly confidential.

Thanks so much, Jane!

Best regards,
Sarah (on behalf of Mark and Sarah)

final_output:
